President Barack Obama: s announcement of sending additional special-operations troops to Syria.
State Department spokesman John Kirby: s statement acknowledging the presence and impact of special operations forces on the ground in Syria.
Journalist Matt Lee: s questioning of Kirby about the inconsistency with Obama's past pledges of "no boots on the ground."
Kirby: s explanation of the administration's definition of "boots on the ground" and how it aligns with the deployment of special operations forces.
